mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}, PRODUCT_BRAND = #{productBrand}, PRODUCT_PRICE = #{productPrice}, PRODUCT_IMGPATH = #{productImgPath}, PRODUCT_IMG = #{productImg}, PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL = #{productThumbnail}, PRODUCT_CONTENT = #{productContent}, PRODUCT_REGDATE = SYSDATE WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode}

UPDATE STOCK SET STOCK_240 = #{stock240}, STOCK_245 = #{stock245}, STOCK_250 = #{stock250}, STOCK_255 = #{stock255}, STOCK_260 = #{stock260}, STOCK_265 = #{stock265}, STOCK_270 = #{stock270}, STOCK_275 = #{stock275}, STOCK_280 = #{stock280}, STOCK_285 = #{stock285}, STOCK_290 = #{stock290}, STOCK_295 = #{stock295} WHERE STOCK_PRODUCT_CODE = #{stockProductCode}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT/*INDEX_DESC(PRODUCT PRODUCT_PK) */ ROWNUM RN , P.PRODUCT_CODE , P.PRODUCT_NAME , P.PRODUCT_BRAND , P.PRODUCT_PRICE , P.PRODUCT_TYPE , P.PRODUCT_IMGPATH , P.PRODUCT_IMG , P.PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL , P.PRODUCT_CONTENT , P.PRODUCT_REGDATE FROM PRODUCT P WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and P.PRODUCT_TYPE = ${Type} ) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT/*INDEX_DESC(PRODUCT PRODUCT_PK) */ ROWNUM RN , P.PRODUCT_CODE , P.PRODUCT_NAME , P.PRODUCT_BRAND , P.PRODUCT_PRICE , P.PRODUCT_TYPE , P.PRODUCT_IMGPATH , P.PRODUCT_IMG , P.PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL , P.PRODUCT_CONTENT , P.PRODUCT_REGDATE FROM PRODUCT P WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and P.PRODUCT_TYPE between ${Type} and (${Type}+19) ) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
